locations.name: Madrid
locations.description: Elegant capital of Spain, known for its world-class art museums ('Golden Triangle'), Royal Palace, vibrant plazas like Plaza Mayor, and sophisticated atmosphere.

locations.name: Seville
locations.description: The fiery heart of Andalusia, famous for its majestic Alcázar palace, the historic Santa Cruz quarter, flamenco performances, and stunning Mudejar architecture.

locations.name: Granada
locations.description: Nestled at the foot of the Sierra Nevada mountains, renowned worldwide for the breathtaking Alhambra Palace and Generalife Gardens, showcasing exquisite Moorish artistry.

locations.name: Montecorto
locations.description: A picturesque 'white village' (pueblo blanco) in the Andalusian hills, offering a tranquil retreat amidst olive groves, stunning natural beauty, and authentic rural charm.
